mdxSource.renderedOutput:
• Initial Release Date: 17 September 2020
  • Developers: CD Projekt Red, 4yrs in development.
  • Platforms: PlayStation 4, Google Stadia, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X and Series S, Microsoft Windows.
  • Type: Action and Role-play, Open world
  • Genere: Science Fiction

Facts you may not know

Originally a tabletop role-plating board game, written by Mike Pondsmith, and first published by R. Talsorian Games in 1988.

Timeline
1st Edition2nd Edition4th Edition
199020052020
Set in 2013...2045
CyberpunkCyberpunk 2020Cyberpunk Red

12 years in the making and released Dec 2020, it was actually only 4 years in the development, from 2016.

Major Events

  • Collapse of Global Superpowers
  • Rise of warfaring Megacorporations
  • Food blights and Famines
  • By 1990's Middle east is a radioactive desert
  • Bioengineering for warfaring and a rise in cybernetic prosthetics and direct human-machine interfaces
  • Lack of Government and Civil Enforcement has led to a endemic rise in Casual violence, and designer drugs
  • "Technoshock" from inability to cope with drugs, synthetics and organic muscle tissues that predominate life

Locations

Night City,

West Coast USA, between LA and San Francisco, is the main location. Population, around 5million

From the title set in the future 2077.

Updates

Update 1.04 brings a ton of updates and patches for bugs and in-gameplay improvements. Live on PC now.

Issues

So I installed the game via Steam, and immediately I was hit with the Flatliner error on launching the game from the Steam Library. A quick google verified this has been an issue.

First things first, I checked the install, by doing the ususal Verify Install of local Files (Properties > Local Files > Verify Integrity of Game Files). This verified there was no errors. Some steam users have had errors verified and fixed.

Then I tried the reboot famd launch from fresh. Still no joy.

Next, I went to the local folder under my Steam Library, and ran "REDprelauncher.exe". This worked, I'm in. Yes, I've not wasted my gamer tokens. Gr8!

But whats' the actual Steam problem...

Steam Flatlining Error

For many players attempting to download the CD Projekt Red smash on Steam, the download seems to crash when it gets to around 94%.

source

One fix is to do as I suggested above, running the "REDprelauncher.exe" from the local game root folder.

But you miss out on achievements in Steam.

Run as Administrator

Another option to try is to run the above exe as an Admin by choosing the option under Properties > Compatablity Mode, within Windows Explorer.

Disable Steam Overlay

Also try disabling the Steam Overlay while in-game, within Steam. Right-click the Game and choose properties. Under the General Tab, uncheck - "Enable the Steam Overlay while in-game"

These options should allow you to laumch the game without the Flatline Error, and get to the Official Cyberpunk 2077 splash screen.
